name: Griffin Rider Legend: Glory Soldier Defence against the dragon fire empire - Free
name_original: Griffin Rider Legend: Glory Soldier Defence against the dragon fire empire - Free
description:
TRY OUR GRIFFIN RIDER LEGEND : GLORY SOLDIER DEFENCE AGAINST THE DRAGON FIRE EMPIRE GAME

The story is about griffin and knight fighting against a dragon invasion. You have to kill dragon as much as possible by saving yourself from dragon fire.

If you kill enough dragons then you can unlock 5 new griffin characters and get chance to enter 2 different levels. This is the most adventure game which will make you hangout for hour and hour.

Features:

- 5 Powerful griffin to unlock
- Breathe fire into the path
- 2 different levels to play
-------------
How to play?

- Guide your griffin while killing dragon on your way
- If you kill enough dragon then you can unlock 5 powerful griffins
- Get chance to enter into 2 new levels

Download now for experience of amazing adventure trip!

Send us your most welcome comments!
You can leave them at: support@meilleursjeuxmobiles.com
